text: Stean Pienaar (born ) is a South African rugby union player for the in the Currie Cup and the in the Rugby Challenge. He is a utility back that can play at centre, wing or scrum-half. He made his Currie Cup debut for the Golden Lions in July 2019, starting their opening match of the 2019 season against the on the right wing. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Rugby union centres Category:Rugby union wings Category:Golden Lions players Category:Doping cases in rugby union
